response.overview: Two mismatched entrepreneurs – egghead innovator Mike Lazaridis and cut-throat businessman Jim Balsillie – joined forces in an endeavour that was to become a worldwide hit in little more than a decade. The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.
response.title: BlackBerry

release_dates.note: South by Southwest Film & TV Festival

results.name: Myth-making and Truth with BLACKBERRY's Matt Johnson and Jay Baruchel
